Joe Nasr

Dear Ms. Battini,

Let us have the amount of the stock to be included, so Axa Will have an idea.

 

Please note that in the current policy, the Rhenus as service provider is excluded.

 

We remain at your disposal and look forward to hearing back from you

 

All the best.

 

 

Joe Nasr
